I just thought up of this idea yesterday, so I want the general Kerbal public to give me their ideas for this. I am planning to host a Kerbal Space Con if Squad allows it, I don't want any copy right problems or some other legal problems. Either way, I am in-fact planning to host one in my city's huge stadium which is used for conferences, shows, ect.

My ideas to be put inside it:

  • Advertisement to get people into KSP
  • Kerbals around the region (or world if so)
  • New designs

I do not know the next update change list, so I doubt we can get suggestions from them. Petition for some suggestions for the next KSP update? It is best if Squad is able to come, maybe even they can host it! So, post problems or ideas or just plain commentation about this!
Read the most recent devblog, they are already having one

They've done kerbalcon twice now, I think. But they've mainly just been stream events, right?

I don't know, last year's came just after I started a long hiatus from KSP madness so I kinda missed out on it >_>
I am talking about a literal Kerbal Space Con, kind of like MineCon...except for the themes and the ideas and such. The basic layout should be MineCon-like atleast!
thats the point. They are planning a physical one. Read the dev blogs.
